languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} is increased by +2 and its {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} is increased by +1. The bonus {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by Voidship Ram based on the distance travelled is increased by +100%. Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Master of Manoeuvres's Athletics skill.
languages.original_text: До конца боя {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Скорость{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g} увеличивается на +2, а {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Маневренность{/g} — на +1. Дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g} от дистанции при применении Тарана кораблем увеличивается на +100%. Продолжительность: +1 раунд за каждые 10 очков в навыке Атлетика у офицера на посту.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, the Flagship's speed is increased by +2 and its manoeuvrability is increased by +1. The bonus damage dealt by Voidship Ram based on the distance travelled is increased by +100%.

Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} is increased by +2 and its {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} is increased by +1. Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Master of Manoeuvres's Athletics skill.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Скорость{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g} увеличивается на 2, а {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}маневренность{/g} — на 1. Дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g} от расстояния при применении Тарана кораблем увеличивается на 100%. Продолжительность: 2 раунда +1 раунд за каждые 20 очков навыка Атлетика у офицера на посту.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} is increased by +2 and its {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} is increased by +1. The bonus {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by Voidship Ram based on the distance travelled is increased by +100%. Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the post officer's Athletics skill.

languages.text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes wird die {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} um +2 und seine {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g} um +1 erhöht. Der Bonus-{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, den Raumschiff-Rammbock basierend auf der zurückgelegten Distanz verursacht, wird um +100 % erhöht. Dauer: +1 Runde für jede 10 Punkte in der Fertigkeit Athletik des Manövermeisters.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} is increased by +2 and its {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} is increased by +1. The bonus {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by Voidship Ram based on the distance travelled is increased by +100%. Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Master of Manoeuvres's Athletics skill.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes wird die {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} um +2 und seine {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g} um +1 erhöht. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonusschaden{/g}, den Raumschiff-Rammbock basierend auf der zurückgelegten Distanz verursacht, wird um +100% erhöht.

Bis zum Ende des Kampfes wird die {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} um +2 und seine {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g} um +1 erhöht. Dauer: +1 Runde für jede 10 Punkte in der Fertigkeit Athletik des Manövermeisters.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} augmente de +2 et sa {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g} de +1. Le bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligé par Bélier de vaisseau spatial en fonction de la distance parcourue augmente de +100 %. Durée : 2 rounds + 1 round par tranche de 20 points de la compétence Athlétisme du maître des manœuvres.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} is increased by +2 and its {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} is increased by +1. The bonus {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by Voidship Ram based on the distance travelled is increased by +100%. Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Master of Manoeuvres's Athletics skill.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} augmente de +2 et sa {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g} de +1. Le bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligé par Bélier de vaisseau spatial en fonction de la distance parcourue augmente de +100 %. Durée : 2 rounds + 1 round par tranche de 20 points dans la compétence Athlétisme du maître des manœuvres.

Jusqu'à la fin du combat, la {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} augmente de +2 et sa {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g} de +1. Le bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par Bélier de Vaisseau Spatial en fonction de la distance parcourue augmente de 100 %. Durée : +1 round par tranche de 10 points dans la compétence Athlétisme du Maître des manœuvres.

La {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} augmente de +2 et sa {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g} de +1. Le bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligé par Bélier de vaisseau spatial en fonction de la distance parcourue augmente de +100 %. Durée : 2 rounds + 1 round par tranche de 20 points dans la compétence Athlétisme du maître des manœuvres.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}提高2点，{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}提高1点。此外，舰船撞角远距离移动造成的额外{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高100%。 持续时间：两轮，机动大师每有20点运动技能，持续时间延长一轮。

Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Master of Manoeuvres's Athletics skill.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}提高2点，{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}提高1点。此外，舰船撞角远距离移动造成的额外{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高100%。 持续时间：两轮，机动大师每有20点运动技能，持续时间延长一轮。

{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}提高2点，{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}提高1点。此外，舰船撞角远距离移动造成的额外{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高100%。 持续时间：机动大师每有10点运动技能，持续时间延长一轮。

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} aumenta en +2 y su {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g} en +1. La bonificación al {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} de Ariete de nave del vacío por recorrer distancia aumenta un +100 %. Duración: 2 asaltos +1 asalto por cada 20 puntos de Atletismo del Maestro de maniobras.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} is increased by +2 and its {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} is increased by +1. The bonus {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by Voidship Ram based on the distance travelled is increased by +100%. Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Master of Manoeuvres's Athletics skill.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} aumenta en +2 y su {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g} en +1. La bonificación al {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} de Ariete de nave del vacío por recorrer distancia aumenta un +100 %. Duración: 2 asaltos +1 asalto por cada 20 puntos de Atletismo del Maestro de maniobras.

Hasta el final del combate, la {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} aumenta en +2 y su {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g} en +1. La bonificación al {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} de Ariete de nave del vacío por recorrer distancia aumenta un +100 %. Duración: +1 asalto por cada 10 puntos de Atletismo del Maestro de maniobras.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}が+2増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}が+1増加する。ヴォイドシップ・ラムの移動距離に応じて与えられるボーナス{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+100%増加する。 持続時間：2ラウンド。戦略マスターの解体スキル20ごとに+1ラウンド。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} is increased by +2 and its {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} is increased by +1. The bonus {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by Voidship Ram based on the distance travelled is increased by +100%. Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Master of Manoeuvres's Athletics skill.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘終了まで、{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}が+2増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}が+1増加する。ヴォイドシップ・ラムの移動距離に応じて与えられるボーナス{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+100%増加する。 持続時間：戦略マスターの解体スキル10ごとに+1ラウンド。
